Title.language: Doxology for St. Apa-Noub of Nehis

language.div: Doksologi untuk Santo Apa-Noub dari Nehis

comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Apanoub:

text.language: Nyok oua~lou n~cabe: w~ Apanoub piremneh/c: eybe pektoubo nem pekcemnoc: akswpi m~menrit m~pidecpout/c.
You are a wise child: O Apa-Noub of Nehis: because you are pure and chaste: you are loved by the Master.

language.div: Kau anak yang bijak, ya Apa-Noub dari Nehis, karena kau murni dan suci, dikasihi Sang Penebus.

text.language: أنت صبي حكيم يا أبانوب النهيسي من أجل طهارتك وعفتك صرت حبيباً للسيد.
Af,w m~pikocmoc t/rf: efkw] n~ca na niv/oui: afwl m~pefc~tauroc e~jwf: afjemh/ou n~tef'u,/.
He abandoned the whole world: in order to seek the heavens: he carried his cross: and he gained his soul.

language.div: Ia tinggalkan seluruh dunia, 'tuk cari Kerajaan Surga, ia pikul salibnya,

text.language: ترك عنه العالم كله طالبا السمائيات وحمل صليبه وربح نفسه.
Etafes e~bol qen nef[alauj: ouoh tefa~ve e~pec/t: e~h~r/i e~jen piywk n~joi: m~pefkim afertajro n~h/t.
When he was hung by his feet: his head was down on the ship’s pole: he did not move: his heart was full of strength.

language.div: Saat ia digantung terbalik, dengan kepala di tiang kapal, ia tak bergeming, hatinya penuh kekuatan.

text.language: لما علقوه من قدمية ورأسه إلي أسفل علي صاري المركب لم يتزعزع وثبت قلبه.
Afswpi n~oulu,nia~ n~noub: qen nitopoc n~te nipictoc: pijwri eyouab Apanoub: v/e~tafsep n~nibacanoc.
He became a golden lampstand: in the places of the faithful: the strong saint Apa-Noub: who received tortures.

language.div: Ia jadi kandil emas, di tengah umat yang setia, santo yang kuat, Apa-Noub, yang terima banyak siksaan.

text.language: صار منارة ذهبية في ديار المؤمنين القوي القديس أبانوب الذي تحمل العذاب.
Hanm/s e~taunau e~pefagwn: nem pefnah] ettajr/out: auero~mologin qen ouq~rwou: Pennou] pe I/couc v/e~tc~marwout.
The people who saw his struggle: and his firm faith: voiced their confessions: “Our God is Jesus the Blessed”.

language.div: Orang-orang yang lihat perjuangannya, dan imannya yang teguh, menyatakan pengakuan mereka: "Allah kami adalah Yesus yang Terberkati."

text.language: كثيرون لما رأوا جهاده وأيمانه الثابت اعترفوا باعلان إلهنا هو يسوع المبارك.
Au[i nemaf m~pi,~lom n~atlwm: n~te ]metmarturoc: hiten pounah] etcoutwn: e~qoun e~Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
They took with him the unfading crown: of martyrdom: through their upright faith: in our Lord Jesus Christ.

language.div: Mereka pun turut terima mahkota kemartiran yang takkan layu, melalui iman yang benar pada Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus.

text.language: ونالوا معه اكليل الشهادة الغير المضمحل من قبل إيمانهم المستقيم بربنا يسوع المسيح.
<ere nak w~ pimarturoc: n~te Peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#: ,ere piswij n~genneoc: Apanoub piremneh/c.
Hail to you, O martyr: of our Lord Jesus Christ: Hail to the courageous hero: Apa-Noub of Nehis.

language.div: Salam bagimu, hai martir, dari Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus. Salam bagi pahlawan pemberani, Apa-Noub dari Nehis.

text.language: السلام لك يا شهيد ربنا يسوع المسيح السلام للشجاع البطل أبانوب النهيسي.
